input_text:
Job Title: Grinder Operator Pr03 - 1st Shift - Cincinnati OH

Location: Cincinnati, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details:

Ability to operate a grinding machine safely, and while keeping work area clean. To be knowledgeable in the areas of GMP and safety, as it pertains to the grinding process.

Tasks:

The Grinder Operator is responsible to inspect equipment, parts, and blades to verify they are in good repair and sanitary, prior to set up.

Must be able to read and interpret work instructions.

Must be able to accurately identify all raw materials used in the grinding process.

Assist in the accurate verification of proper lot number usage in accordance with lots specified on formulas.

Read, comprehend, and accurately perform any written/typed instructions for an item formulation.

Must be able to use basic math skills when completing production paperwork. Complete all QA checks and documentation for the raw area.

Perform appropriate transactions using RF terminal or scanner.

Responsible for shift change communication.

Responsible for controlling losses of product.

Wash down equipment for product changeovers and discard trash in the proper container.

Maintain a clean and organized work area.

Box combos of raw materials as required. Insure that rework is used in each load as specified.

Inform proper warehouse personnel in a timely manner of all raw materials needed for the grinding process.

Position may require employee to maintain a forklift license to help move product.

Team member has an individual responsibility to report all possible deficiencies that could compromise food safety.

Must be willing and able to lift up to 80lbs. as required.

The position will work in an environment with extreme temperatures ranging from 39F to 90F.

Team member must adhere to all GMP standards and safety guidelines while performing job duties.

Requirements:

External:

Must have held a position for six (6) months within the past twelve (12) months with the same employer.

Must be willing to work overtime and weekends when required.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

1ST SHIFT (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Grinder Operator Pr03 - 1st Shift
job_responsibilities: Inspect equipment, parts, and blades for good repair and sanitation.
Accurately identify raw materials used in the grinding process.
Use basic math skills for production paperwork.
Complete QA checks and documentation for raw area.
Use RF terminal or scanner for transactions.
Wash down equipment and discard trash.
Maintain a clean and organized work area.
Box raw materials and use rework.
Notify warehouse personnel of raw material needs.
benefits: Affordable health, life, dental, vision, and prescription drug benefits
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.
